title: An AIE probe for the fluorescence and colorimetric sensing of La3+
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,28469-28474
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA01445F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Wan-Ying Lin, Zi-Ao Zong, Jing Wang, Qi Huang, Zhi-Yong Xing, Chuan-Bin Fan, Na-Na Li
A colorimetric fluorescent sensor named N, which exhibited solid state emission, was developed for the fluorescence colorimetric sensing of La3+ in water and in the solid state with high selectivity and sensitivity.
